data.text:
@_P_Bradley_ Hello Pete,
please provide us the claim file number via DM in order to verify. Thank you.

@ernani_sch Hello ernani,
we are verifying the situation. You will be contacted via email as soon as possible. Thank you.

@marina_sales_ Olá Marina,
respondemos através de mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@SDensham Hello Steven,
please provide us the booking reference via DM in order to verify. Thank you.

@laura_barry Hello Laura,
we hereby inform that we are verifying the situation. You will be contacted via email as soon as possible. Thank you.

@shiroberbere Hello Soft Belly Baby,

We sincerely apologize for the situation mentioned and the inconvenience caused. TAP Air Portugal works everyday in order to promote our passenger satisfaction and to improve our services. In case you require our assistance, please let us know. Thank you.
@V2Legend Can you please clarify? Thank you.
@Phgwe1 Hello Phgwe, we have replied via private message. Thank you.

@Contamais12 Olá Conta Mais,

poderia nos indicar, por mensagem privada, o seu código de reserva, para que possamos verificar, por favor? Obrigado.
@veronmeo Nous continuons par message direct. Merci.

@mconnolly89 Hello Martin,
we have replied via private message. Thank you.

@veronmeo Bonjour Véro, afin que nous puissions vérifier, nous vous prions de nous indiquer le code de réservation et / ou le numéro du billet électronique et / ou le code ROR par message direct, s'il vous plaît, pour des raisons de confidentialité. Merci d'avance pour l'information.

@Shakahmad07 Hello Shakeel,

can you inform us through DM your booking reference or electronic ticket number (047...) so we may verify? Thank you.

@dlgarz94 Hola dlgarz94,

el vuelo salió con 30 minutos de retraso y llegó a Lisboa a las 16:40 (hora local). Gracias.

@ageekymom Hello Lisa,
thank you for your comment and your preference 😉✈️

@s_fats Hello Therealogfatou,
please provide us the booking reference via private message in order to verify. Thank you.

@jakrobar Hello,
please provide us the ticket number via private message in order to verify. Thank you.
@AmaPomaah_ Hello Melissa, we have replied to your DM. Thank you.

@johannluk Salve Gianlu,

potrebbe informarci sul messaggio privato il suo codice di prenotazione oppure il numero di biglietto elettronico (047...) per che possiamo controllare? Grazie.
@goughowen1 @goughowen1 Hello Owen, we replied to your DM. Thank you.

urls.title: Contact form - Send requests, suggestions or complaints | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Speak with TAP, complete the contact form and share your view of our service. Submit your information requests, praise, suggestions or complaints.

data.text:
@riakymch Hello Roman, 
you can make your complaint by filling out the form available at the link: 
https://t.co/CSHVt5o6Dj 
Any other question we might assist you with do not hesitate to contact us 
Thank You

@Bueckersche @bueckersche Hello Heike, we have replied to your direct message. 
Thank you.

@rahabika Olá @rahabika, lamentamos os transtornos causados. Pedimos que nos indique o seu número de reclamação.
Por motivos de confidencialidade sugerimos o envio por mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@ojohns50 Hello OJ,
We present our most sincere apologies for all inconveniences caused.
In order to assist you, please provide us the lost luggage claim file reference. 
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.
@carolc1965 @carolc1965 Hello, we replied to your direct message. Thank you.
@naudog20 Olá Josh, respondemos às suas mensagens diretas. Obrigado.
@naudog20 Olá Josh, respondemos às suas mensagens diretas. Obrigado.
@silvia19and Hola Silvia, su DM ha sido contestado. Gracias.

@AndrewBoardman You are welcome, Andrew. Thank you too for your feedback and for contacting us. 😊
We remain available.

urls.title: FlyTAP – TAP's official website
urls.description: TAP Air Portugal welcomes you on board! Explore our destinations, search for the cheapest flights and learn all about check-in, on-board meals and TAP Miles&Go miles Programme. Book now!

data.text:
@Albertini2022 Também poderá verificar esta informação no nosso site em https://t.co/tpw1Mhq01B.
Obrigado (2/2)

@Albertini2022 Olá Alberto, 
Informamos que na última semana de Dezembro temos voos de Lisboa para São Tomé nos dias 25, 28, 29, 30 e 31 de Dezembro e no regresso na primeira semana de Janeiro, temos voos nos dias 4, 5, 6 e 7 de Janeiro de 2023. (1/2)

@AndreaRibeiroQ @andrearibeiroq Hello, we have replied to your direct message. 
Thank you.

@davidjf_85 Olá David, pedimos que nos indique o código da reserva ou o número do bilhete, por favor. Por motivos de confidencialidade de dados, sugerimos que nos envie os dados por mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@damali101 Hello Ma, we understand your considerations, but for aviation purposes this is the standard to follow, although the title is used for statistical matters only: MR  for adult man or MRS for adult woman. It is non related to marital status. Thank you.

@amalia_ort @amalia_ort Hola Amalia, le solicitamos que envíe el código de reserva por mensaje privado.
Gracias.
@j_osborne @j_osborne Hello Jarvis, we replied by private message. Thank you.

@AlineNaoBarr0s @alinenaobarr0s Olá Aline, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. 
Obrigada.
@CamilaLoliv @camilaloliv Hello, we have answered your private message. Thank you.
@JohnBoldeu @johnboldeu, we have answered your private message. Thank you.

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

domain.name: Technology
domain.description: for individual and types of technology, e.g., food technology, 3D printing

data.text:
@lbastosandrade Olá Livia, informamos que respondemos à sua mensagem no Facebook. 
Obrigada.

@HalesToby @halestoby Hello, we replied to your DM. 
Thank you.

@Djego79911530 @djego79911530 Hello Djego, we verified that the complaint is still under analysis. As soon as it is concluded you will receive a reply via e-mail.
We kindly ask you to wait for that reply. In the meantime, if you have further questions, please let us know. Thank you.

@GuevaraBass @Timmermann3Sven Hello, 
We have replied your DM. We kindly ask you to confirm it. Thank you  ✈️

@madalp1 Olá Madela,

poderia nos informar, por mensagem privada, o seu código de reserva, para que possamos verificar, por favor? Obrigado.

@marina_sales_ Olá! Lamentamos desde já todos os inconvenientes causados pela situação exposta. Para que possamos ajudar através deste canal, necessitamos que nos envie uma mensagem direta com o número das reclamações e o email associado. Obrigada
@marina_sales_ @britiburcio Hi! If we can still assist you, please DM us your booking information, the complaint number and the email address linked to it. Thank you in advance
@Timmermann3Sven Hi! As already informed via DM, your complaint is still under analysis. We kindly request that you await our feedback via email. Thank you

@Timmermann3Sven Hi! We inform you that your complaint is still under review. You will be contacted via email once the analysis is completed. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance
@EsporasG Hola! Lamentamos la situación reportada. Hemos contestado a su mensaje directo. Gracias
@OliverJ61316672 Hi! We deeply regret the situation reported. We have in the meantime already replied to your DM. Thank you in advance

@Cat1cycling The situation exposed can only be addressed through complaint. For any clarification, you should respond by email to the complaint or should indicate us the data of the complaint. Thank you
@71ap1 Olá! Lamentamos a situação reportada. Respondemos através de mensagem direta. Obrigada

@Cat1cycling We reiterate the information previously provided. If you have submitted a complaint and do not agree with the response obtained, we ask you to answer back. To check the situation, we will need the full details of the complaint. Thank you
@Cat1cycling Without any access to your file we have no way to assist you. We kindly request that you send us the complaint data. Thank you
@Cat1cycling Hi! To better assist you, please DM us your case number and the email address linked to it. Thank you in advance

@chriskaya2 Hi! We inform you that your complaint is still under review. You will be contacted via email once the analysis is completed. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if any further help is needed. Thank you in advance

@Sally23555314 Hi! We inform you that your case is still under review. You will receive new feedback very soon. We appreciate your patience at this time. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance

@Varinder_Babool Hi! We inform you that everything is in order with your booking. We have forwarded a ticket confirmation to your email. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance

@Samcj9Jackson Hello, 
We have answer your DM. We kindly ask you to confirm if you received it. Thank you  ✈️
@AllenDonna76 Due to confidentiality questions, please provide us the information by private message. Thank you. (2/2)

@AllenDonna76 Hello,
We are deeply sorry to learn that our service did not meet your expectations for your son's flight. In order to verify the situation, please confirm us the complaint number and the e-mail used. (1/2)

@66Lachevre @DJKrush63 Bien que nous comprenions votre urgence et mécontentement, une fois l'analyse terminée, vous serez contactée par mail. Bonus vous prions de bien vouloir patienter. Merci d'avance

@Hartley_Gary Hello Ga®y ღ♥♡ Hartley,
In order to assist you, please provide us the booking reference and/or the ticket number.  
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.
@myselfandirene Olá! Lamentamos desde já a situação reportada. Respondemos através de mensagem direta. Obrigada

@Eyal_BZ Hello Eyal, 
We inform that the payment was already made and all the confirmations were sent by email.
Feel free to contact us back if further assistance is needed.
Thank you.

@Objectif_USA Hello https://t.co/26JOjWSW3U,
We sincerely apologize for the waiting time.
We verify that your complaint is still under analysis and that it will be completed as promptly as possible.
We thank you in advance for your understanding and patience.

entity.name: Travel & Transportation Business
entity.description: Brands, companies, advertisers and every non-person handle with the profit intent related to travel as airlines, travel agencies, hotels

data.text:
@Boaz_Cohen Hello Boaz,

since your flight on the 9th was cancelled due the cabin crew strike. If you wish we can arrange another date in order to travel. How do you wish to proceed?

@sai_monn Bonsoir Saï-Monn,
Pour vérifier la situation, veuillez nos indiquer votre référence de réclamation et l'adresse e-mail associée ? 
Pour des raisons de sécurité, nous vous suggérons de l'envoyer par message privé.
Merci.

@philipgdalton We guarantee that we didn't forget your request.
If you need any further assistance, please let us know. Thank you (2/2)

@philipgdalton Hello, 
We understand your considerations and sincerely apologize for the delay. Due to the high number of requests received in the past few months, all procedures are considerably delayed. (1/2)
@theMarioSisko Hi! We deeply regret the situation reported. We have in the meantime replied to your DM. Thank you in advance

@geannygalvao Olá, 
Respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Pedimos que confirme, por favor  🙂

@jdbheartz Olá, 
Respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Pedimos que confirme, por favor. Obrigado  ✈️

@juliamanns Thank you, Julia.  
We will verify and reply as soon as possible.

@iamChaz_ @MartinSLewis Hello Gavin,
We sincerely apologize for our flight's delay.
If you have already filed a complaint, it will be analyzed as soon as possible.
We thank you in advance for your understanding.

@filipafpereira @nes_scf Olá Filipa,
Já respondemos à sua DM.

@AguRamirezJ Hello Augusto,
We sincerely apologize for the waiting time.
We verify that your complaint is still under analysis and that it will be completed as promptly as possible.
We thank you in advance for your understanding and patience.

@britiburcio Hello Bridget,
regarding to your cases, we verify that 2 e-mails were sent, one on November 28th and the other on November 29th. For further information, you should reply to these e-mails.
We remain available for any other questions.
Thank you.

@feetyours Hello Ben,
May you please let us know your booking code via DM?
